column1: Table A-44: Carbon Content Coefficients for Coal by Consuming Sector and Coal Rank, 1990 – 2000 (MMT C/QBtu)

Sources: Emission factors by consuming sector from B.D. Hong and E.R. Slatnick, “Carbon Dioxide Emission Factors for Coal, “U.S. EIA, Quarterly Coal Report, January-March 1994 (Washington, DC, 1994); and emission factors by rank from Science Applications International Corporation, Analysis of the Relationship Between Heat and Carbon Content of U.S. Fuels: Final Task Report, Prepared for the U.S. EIA, Office of Coal, Nuclear, Electric and Alternative Fuels (Washington, DC 1992).
